item.title: I-League 2nd Divison: FC Pune City, Delhi United play out exciting draw
item.description:
Meghalayan club Langsning FC climbed to the top of the standings in the Group C of the I-League 2nd Division as they outclassed their opponents Jamshedpur FC (Reserves) at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in Shillong, Meghalaya.
Kitboklang Pale was on target early in the eighth minute for the Northeast side scoring after good pressure from the get-go from the home side.

item.title: I-League 2018: Chennai City FC sign Spaniards Sandro Rodriguez, Roberto Eslava Suarez
item.description:
Rodriguez Felipe, a play-maker, has played for UD Las Palmas 'B' and CD Marino (Spanish 2B Division) teams, a press release here said.
"CCFC are delighted to reach an agreement for the transfer of Sandro Rodriguez Felipe on a long-term contract," the release said.
Esalva Suarez, who turned out for Unionistas CF, can play both as left-back and right-back, it said.
"CCFC have reached an agreement for the transfer of Roberto Esalva Suarez for the upcoming I-League season," the release added
